name: search_exchange
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool stock_cryptocurrency_forex_market_data.
Tool description: Real-time Stock, Cryptocurrency, and Forex market data from NASDAQ, NYSE, LSE, MYX, IDX, Binance, FTX, PancakeSwap, Uniswap, FRED etc.
API description: Search for exchanges based on a query string or category.

q.description: A query string to search for specific exchanges. Defaults to 'B'.

category.description: The category to filter the exchanges, for example, 'Cryptocurrency'. Defaults to 'Cryptocurrency'.
